title: The damage on Ekko's ult is fine, the heal is not.
body: He's an assassin, he has a stun which in itself is bullcrap, remove the heal.

replies.body: He definitely needs to be toned down. He for fills to many rolls. Huge aoe and single target damage, large aoe stun which lasts a huge amount of time, aoe slow, a massive shield, lots of mobility, big heal from his ult, invulnerability, percentage health damage and aoe waveclear/poke. He needs to be refined as an assassin, nerf the stun, the shield and the heal that the ult gives and i think he may become balanced.
Even summoner spells get wasted on him cause he just ults back out of it even if it's an exhaust.. Wtf
Remember that the heal is based on the damage dealt over the last 4 seconds. No damage = very slight heal.
So he still gets a heal+ immunity.. let's think about that for a second
Ikr that heal is fucked up aswell as the movement speed.. Yesterday I vsed one that OUTRAN A SINGED WITH RIGHTEOUS GLORY. HOW THE HELL DOES THAT HAPPEN

{{item:3165}} actually destroys a lot of that heal.
It depends entirely if you're whittling him down, or are bursting him.
If you bursted him with a lot of damage within a 4 second time, he can heal huge amounts of it back.
But if you get Morellonomicon then his heal is like, zero. 

Ekko's main passive needs a nerf. It deals too much damage and is innately built so that you can't retaliate, unless you have cheap range/gapclosing abilities or are a ranged champion. Even then, good luck get getting an AA or 2.
its kinda annoying that we were lied to in the trailer, were he wasnt healed after ulting, but he is now. ffs
